studentOnboarding.title: Student Profile Setup
studentOnboarding.stepOf: Step {{current}} of {{total}}: Let's learn about your learning preferences

step1.learningMethodsQuestion: What kinds of activities or methods help you learn best?
step1.visualDesc: I learn best by reading textbooks, looking at diagrams, charts, and pictures
step1.auditoryDesc: I learn best by listening to explanations and discussions
step1.kinestheticDesc: I learn best by doing hands-on practice and activities
step1.videoDesc: I learn best by watching videos and demonstrations

step2.soloVsGroupQuestion: Do you learn better when you study on your own, or do you prefer learning with others?
step2.soloDesc: I prefer working through material on my own
step2.groupDesc: I like group activities and discussions to help me understand
step2.bothDesc: I like a mix of both solo and group learning
step2.scheduledVsFlexibleQuestion: Do you like to follow a set study schedule or plan, or do you prefer to be flexible?
step2.scheduledDesc: I thrive with a set routine and plan
step2.flexibleDesc: I prefer to decide what to study as I go

step3.motivationQuestion: What motivates you to put in your best effort when learning something new?
step3.curiosityDesc: I love learning about new topics that interest me
step3.gradesDesc: I want to achieve high grades and academic success
step3.encouragementDesc: I'm motivated by praise and encouragement from others
step3.personalGoalsDesc: I'm driven by my own goals and aspirations
step3.competitionDesc: I'm motivated by friendly competition with peers

step4.helpQuestion: If you're struggling to understand a concept or skill, what's the best way someone can help you?
step4.hints: Give me hints or clues to figure it out myself
step4.differentWay: Explain it in a different way or with different examples
step4.moreTime: Let me figure it out on my own with more time
step4.teacherQuestion: What do you look for in a teacher or coach?
step4.patient: Someone who is patient and understanding
step4.challenging: Someone who pushes me to achieve my best
step4.clear: Someone who explains everything very clearly
step4.fun: Someone who makes learning fun and engaging

step5.feedbackQuestion: How do you prefer to receive feedback or corrections on your work?
step5.discussion: A quick talk where the teacher goes over how I did
step5.goalQuestion: What is one goal you hope to achieve through this learning experience?
step5.goalPlaceholder: e.g., Improve my grade, master a skill, gain confidence, prepare for college...

step6.specialNeedsQuestion: Do you have any specific needs or preferences that help you learn better?
step6.specialNeedsPlaceholder: e.g., Short breaks, visual aids, hands-on practice, quiet environment...
step6.additionalNotesQuestion: Is there anything else you'd like your teacher or the AI to know about how you like to learn or study?
step6.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Share any other comments, learning difficulties, anxieties, or preferences...
